thread.title: Judith Dancer
thread.title_full: Mabel's Labels reviewed by Judith Dancer

author: Judith Dancer
title: Judith Dancer
text: Great little labels! Easy to order. Easy to use. I received the labels within days of ordering - lovely surprize! I should have requested black print instead of my 97 year old Mother's favourite colour of mauve as well as a little larger size as in a Long Term Care home the laundry may not notice the delicate name on her clothes. I highly recommend the quality and efficient service of Mabel's Labels.
